briefdescription.para: Draw functions Scene_group_item's children are not drawn by the scene, they are drawn by the group.

detaileddescription.para:
Calls Scene_item::draw(), then calls Scene_item::drawEdges() and Scene_item::drawPoints for each child if its current rendering mode is adequat.
RenderingMode

briefdescription.para: draws all the children

detaileddescription.para:
Calls Scene_item::drawEdges(), then calls Scene_item::draw() and Scene_item::drawPoints for each child if its current rendering mode is adequat.
RenderingMode

briefdescription.para: draws all the children

detaileddescription.para:
Calls Scene_item::drawPoints(), then calls Scene_item::draw() and Scene_item::drawEdges() for each child if its current rendering mode is adequat.
RenderingMode

memberdef.argsstring: (Viewer_interface *, QMap< float, int > &picked_item_IDs, const QPoint &picked_pixel, bool with_names)
memberdef.name: renderChildren

briefdescription.para: deals with the rendering, selecting and picking of the group's children.

parameterdescription.para: the screen point that has been picked.
should be true if a picking is being performed.

briefdescription.para: Contains a reference to all the children of this group.

memberdef.argsstring: (QString name=QString("New group"), int nb_vbos=0, int nb_vaos=0)
memberdef.name: Scene_group_item

briefdescription.para: Sets the scene;.
Returns false to avoid disturbing the BBox of the scene.
Returns true to avoid disturbing the BBox of the scene.
Locks a child.

detaileddescription.para: A locked child cannot be moved out of the group nor can it be deleted. Use it to prevent a child to be destroyed without its parent.

briefdescription.para: Locks a child.

detaileddescription.para: A locked child cannot be moved out of the group nor can it be deleted. Use it to prevent a child to be destroyed without its parent.

briefdescription.para: Unlocks a child.
Unlocks a child.
Tells if a child is locked.

simplesect.para: true if the child is locked.

briefdescription.para: Tells if a child is locked.

simplesect.para: true if the child is locked.

briefdescription.para: Returns if the group_item is currently expanded or collapsed in the Geometric Objects list.

detaileddescription.para:
True means expanded, false means collapsed.
isExpanded().

briefdescription.para: Makes the group_item expanded or collapsed in the view.

detaileddescription.para:
True means expanded, false means collapsed.
isExpanded().

briefdescription.para: Returns an empty Bbox to avoid disturbing the Bbox of the scene.
Not supported.
Indicates if the rendering mode is supported.

simplesect.para: true for all rendering modes that are shared by all of the children.
a string containing the number of children.

briefdescription.para: Adds a CGAL::Three::Scene_item* to the list of children.
Adds a CGAL::Three::Scene_item* to the list of children from its id.
getChild gives access to the Scene_item of the wanted index.

simplesect.para: the CGAL::Three::Scene_item which index is id.

briefdescription.para: Sets all the children to the specified color.
Sets all the children in the specified rendering mode.
Sets all the children to the specified visibility.
Sets all the children in points mode.
Sets all the children in wireframe rendering.
Sets all the children in wireframe rendering.
Sets all the children in flat rendering.
Sets all the children in flat rendering.
Sets all the children in flat rendering with edges.
Sets all the children in smooth rendering.
Sets all the children in point rendering with normals.
Sets the alpha value for the froup and all its children.
Returns a list of all the direct children.

detaileddescription.para: Only returns children that have this item as a parent. Children of these children are not returned.

briefdescription.para: getChildrenForSelection returns the list of children to select along with the group.

detaileddescription.para: When a Scene_group_item is added to the selection of the scene, this function defines which of its children will be added too. Typically overriden to allow applying an operation from the Operation menu only to the parent item and not to its children.

briefdescription.para: Removes a Scene_item from the list of children.
Removes a Scene_item from the list of children using its index.
Moves a child up in the list.
Moves a child down in the list.
Redraws children.

detaileddescription.para: As each drawing function of a group draws all parts of its children, once any of these functions is called, we skip all drawing calls until resetDraw() is called. This keeps children from being drawn several times. It is automatically called at the end of the scene's draw() function.

briefdescription.para: adjustIds maintains the list of children up to date when an item has been erased.

parameterdescription.para: the index of the item that has been erased.

briefdescription.para: A Scene_group_item is a special Scene_item that does not draw anything, but regroups other items as its children.

detaileddescription.para: It allows the user to apply several actions to multiple items at the same time. A custom Scene_item can derive from it to have children. They appear hierarchically in the Geometric Objects list.
